医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
南加州大学的研究揭示了癌细胞如何转移的关键细节南加州大学的一项令人惊讶的发现揭示了癌细胞如何转移的关键细节，并提出了阻止其扩散的新治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/USC-study-reveals-key-details-about-how-cancer-cells-metastasize.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/USC-study-reveals-key-details-about-how-cancer-cells-metastasize.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4d60466-afaf-482a-801c-597981c6a534 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:43:43 -0400 USC study reveals key details about how cancer cells metastasize
这一发现重新定义了目前对人类角膜免疫细胞景观的理解墨尔本大学的研究人员发现，保护健康人类角膜免受病原体和炎症侵害的哨兵是 T 细胞，而不是之前认为的另一种称为树突状细胞的免疫细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Discovery-redefines-current-understanding-of-immune-cell-landscape-in​​-the- human-cornea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Discovery-redefines-current-understanding-of-immune-cell-landscape-in​​-the- human-cornea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34f85874-e834-43d6-b7f1-8e65f669633c Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:36:24 -0400 Discovery redefines current understanding of immune cell landscape in the human cornea
研究表明，捐献肾脏对于艾滋病毒感染者来说是安全的根据今天发表在《柳叶刀区域健康 - 美洲》杂志上的一项研究结果，约翰霍普金斯大学医学院和三个合作医疗机构的研究人员表明，向其他艾滋病毒感染者 (PLWH) 捐赠肾脏的人类免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 感染者在捐赠后的几年内患终末期肾病 (ESKD) 或其他肾脏问题的风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Donating-a-kidney-can-be-safe-for-people-living-with-HIV-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Donating-a-kidney-can-be-safe-for-people-living-with-HIV-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed393ede-860f-4365-9bdf-348ccbf40ae2 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:34:00 -0400 Donating a kidney can be safe for people living with HIV, study shows
新检测方法可识别去势抵抗性前列腺癌中 p300/CBP 乙酰化发生改变的患者2023 年 7 月 20 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷上发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“Development of a Multiple Assay to Assessactivated p300/CBP in Cycling Prostate Tumor cells”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-assay-identifying-患者-with-altered-p300CBP-乙酰化-in-castration-resistance-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-assay-identifying-病人-with-altered-p300CBP-乙酰化-in-castration-resistance-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36b9a884-fb41-4ce7-972a-cb1a94670dd7 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 21:17:11 -0400 New assay identifies patients with altered p300/CBP acetylation in castration-resistant prostate cancer
脱醇圆叶葡萄酒可以改善皮肤弹性圆叶葡萄酒可以帮助松弛下垂的皮肤吗？根据一项新的研究，与服用安慰剂的女性相比，每天喝两杯脱醇圆叶葡萄葡萄酒的女性皮肤弹性和保水性显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Dealcoholized-muscadine-wine-may-improve-skin-elasticity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Dealcoholized-muscadine-wine-may-improve-skin-elasticity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c2ed689-d935-40dc-8374-6a0097b56fad Mon, 24 Jul 2023 21:13:54 -0400 Dealcoholized muscadine wine may improve skin elasticity
新活动旨在减少新生儿筛查后囊性纤维化的漏诊或延迟诊断芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院正在领导一项宣传活动，旨在减少新生儿筛查后囊性纤维化的漏诊或延迟诊断，尤其是非白人婴儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-campaign-aims-to-reduce-missed-or-delayed-diagnosis-of-cystic-chemistry-after-newborn-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-campaign-aims-to-reduce-missed-or-delayed-diagnosis-of-cystic-chemistry-after-newborn-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4867cbd9-deb0-4922-ae75-5148f3b33ec5 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 21:12:58 -0400 New campaign aims to reduce missed or delayed diagnosis of cystic fibrosis after newborn screening
每日食用西梅对心血管健康相关的生物标志物具有良好的影响今天在美国营养学会 (ASN) 年会上以摘要形式提交的两项新研究报告称，每日食用西梅对与心血管健康相关的多种生物标志物具有良好的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Daily-prune-conspiration-has-promising-effects-on-biomarkers-lated-to-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Daily-prune-conspiration-has-promising-effects-on-biomarkers-lated-to-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9652c80d-2409-4561-84d3-97973604dce2 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:42:07 -0400 Daily prune consumption has promising effects on biomarkers related to cardiovascular health
研究表明，零食的质量比数量或频率更重要零食越来越受欢迎，超过 70% 的人表示他们每天至少吃两次零食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Quality-of-snacking-matters-more-than-quantity-or-Frequency-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Quality-of-snacking-matters-more-than-quantity-or-Frequency-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4611f2ba-a310-47a0-843e-e9505cd49ec4 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:34:47 -0400 Quality of snacking matters more than quantity or frequency, study shows
研究揭示了减缓阿尔茨海默病进展的新方法凯斯西储大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，通过抑制大脑中导致腐蚀的特定蛋白质，可以减缓阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-new-way-to-slow-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-new-way-to-slow-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ae97cb-8bc8-4b2e-8bae-7a6f1550842b Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:25:28 -0400 Study reveals new way to slow progression of Alzheimer's disease
新研究量化了流感儿童神经精神事件的发生率虽然美国儿童中与流感相关的神经精神事件的发生率尚不清楚，但关于使用通常用于治疗儿童流感的常见抗病毒药物的争议引起了家长和医疗专业人员的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-study-quantizes-the-incidence-of-neuropsychiatric-events-in-children-with-flu.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-study-quantizes-the-incidence-of-neuropsychiatric-events-in-children-with-flu.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0959b3e4-9eb7-4220-8560-e758ff539f73 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:23:03 -0400 New study quantifies the incidence of neuropsychiatric events in children with flu
